description: PERMANENT UX Hospitality Fixes - These fixes ensure every user interaction has a clear next step. DO NOT REMOVE even during redesigns.
core_principle: Every state must have a clear, friendly hook to the next action. No dead-ends. VIP hospitality experience.

parameter_collection.description: When Nexus asks user for input (URLs, names, channels)
parameter_collection.principle: Never ask for raw input without offering easy alternatives

oauth_connection.description: When user needs to connect an app/service
oauth_connection.principle: Make connection feel like unlocking a superpower, not a chore

sample_data.description: When beta test needs sample/trigger data
sample_data.principle: Pre-fill with realistic examples, explain clearly, easy skip option

error_recovery.principle: Friendly recovery with clear action buttons, never blame user

execution_progress.principle: Keep user engaged with progress, celebrate small wins

ux_rules: Every prompt must have at least one clickable action button
Never show raw technical terms (JSON, API, slug) to users
Error messages must include a 'Fix This' or 'Try Again' button
Loading states must show what's happening in friendly language
Success states must celebrate and suggest next steps
Input fields must have examples or pre-filled smart defaults
When asking for external resources (URLs, IDs), offer to create/browse them
